short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant product alternatives. Go from Big Box to Shop Small.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop Smaller is a free extension that gives you alternative products as you shop on Big Box retailer sites.

As you search, browse, and view products on Big Box sites, the extension reveals a list of suggested products from millions of smaller online stores.  Simply click on the alternative product to be taken directly to the product on the stores’ site.

Look for the "S" icon to appear along the right side of your screen as you shop – click it, and scroll through an endless list of alternative products from small independent sellers.  It’s easy, fun, and powerful.

There is no better way to Shop Small than with the Shop Smaller Chrome extension.
_______________________________________

A partnership with Shop Smaller is currently available.
